009package imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving;
010
011import imagingbook.common.image.access.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
012import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
013
014public interface NagaoMatsuyamaF {
015
016        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
017
018                @DialogLabel("Variance threshold (0,..,10)")
019                public double varThreshold = 0.0;
020
021                @DialogLabel("Out-of-bounds strategy")
022                public OutOfBoundsStrategy obs = OutOfBoundsStrategy.NearestBorder;
023        }
024        
025        abstract class Constants {
026                protected static final int[][] R0 =
027                        {{-1,-1}, {0,-1}, {1,-1},
028                         {-1, 0}, {0, 0}, {1, 0},
029                         {-1, 1}, {0, 1}, {1, 1}};
030                        
031                        // -------------------
032                        
033                protected static final int[][] R1 =
034                        {{-2,-1}, {-1,-1},
035                         {-2, 0}, {-1, 0}, {0, 0},
036                         {-2, 1}, {-1, 1}};
037                        
038                protected static final int[][] R2 =
039                        {{-2,-2}, {-1,-2},
040                         {-2,-1}, {-1,-1}, {0,-1},
041                                  {-1, 0}, {0, 0}};
042                        
043                protected static final int[][] R3 =
044                        {{-1,-2}, {0,-2}, {1,-2}, 
045                         {-1,-1}, {0,-1}, {1,-1},
046                                  {0, 0}};
047
048                protected static final int[][] R4 =
049                        {        {1,-2}, {2,-2},
050                         {0,-1}, {1,-1}, {2,-1},
051                         {0, 0}, {1, 0}};
052                        
053                protected static final int[][] R5 =
054                        {        {1,-1}, {2,-1},
055                         {0, 0}, {1, 0}, {2, 0},
056                                 {1, 1}, {2, 1}};
057                        
058                protected static final int[][] R6 =
059                        {{0,0}, {1,0},
060                         {0,1}, {1,1}, {2,1},
061                                {1,2}, {2,2}};
062
063                protected static final int[][] R7 =
064                        {        {0,0},
065                         {-1,1}, {0,1}, {1,1},
066                         {-1,2}, {0,2}, {1,2}};
067                        
068                protected static final int[][] R8 =
069                        {        {-1,0}, {0,0},
070                         {-2,1}, {-1,1}, {0,1},
071                         {-2,2}, {-1,2}};
072                        
073                        // -------------------
074                        
075                protected static final int[][][] SubRegions = {R1, R2, R3, R4, R5, R6, R7, R8};
076        }
077        
078}
